name: Destroyer
description:
Let Destroyer recursively detach instances, remove auto layouts and detach styles within you current selection so you can iterate faster!


When working collaboratively and you quickly want to try an idea out it's always a hassle to detach the component and remove auto layouts.


Choose what you want to destroy:


  • Everything - Instances, Auto Layouts and Styles
  • Instances only
  • Auto Layouts only
  • Styles only


How To Use


  1. Select the elements you want to destroy
  2. Choose what you want to destroy
  3. Profit
